channel.title: Garbage-Crisis on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Garbage-Crisis on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Wednesday Brief: Opposition Leader Monday Showdown, Solar Power for Linden, and Georgetown's Garbage Emergency
item.description: Speaker Nadir finally schedules Opposition Leader vote for Monday while calling candidate an ‘international fugitive.’ Plus: Linden gets solar farms, Georgetown drowning in garbage, and the Mohameds saga continues. Your 5-minute news circus.
